Basic Macros
Internal Definitions
Internal Macros
Interactive (API) Macros and Definitions
NAMESPACE

Defines the usable namespace for all preceeding classes.  When extending a class from another class, both classes must be within the same namespace.

EXCEPTION

Defines the exception codes When declare a new exception, must use an uniq exception code define here

CLASS(className)

Initializes a new class, or overwrites an existing one.  Interaction with the class can be performed with the following code: ["memberName", args] call ClassName; This code must be executed in the correct namespace, and will only have access to public members.

Parameters
className

The name of the class [string].

See Also

<CLASSEXTENDS>

CLASS_EXTENDS(childClassName,parentClassName)

Initializes a new class extending a parent class, or overwrites an existing class.  Interaction with the class can be performed with the following code: ["memberName", args] call ClassName; This code must be executed in the correct namespace, and will only have access to public members.

Parameters
childClassName

The name of the child class [string].

parentClassName

The name of the parent class [string].

See Also

CLASS

FUNCTION(typeStr,fncName)

Initializes a new function member of a class.

Parameters
typeStr

The typeName of the argument. Reference http://​community​.bistudio​.com​/wiki​/typeName [string].

fncName

The name of the function member [string].

See Also

<VARIABLE>

SUPER(memberStr,args)

Insert the parent function in the current function

Parameters
memberStr

The name of the parent mumber function

args

The arguments to be passed to the member function or variable [any].

NEW(class, args)

Instanciate a new object of class with args

DELETE(class, instance)

Delete the instance of object of class

STATIC_FUNCTION(class, fncName, args)

Call a static function name of class with args

FUNC_GETVAR(varName)

Returns a variable of the current class, used as a function.

Example

PUBLIC FUNCTION("","getSpawnState") FUNC_GETVAR("spawned");

Parameters
varName

The name of the variable member [string].

ENDCLASS

Ends a class's initializaton and finalizes SQF output.
